title: gaNapatiyE karuNAnidhiyE
sahitya:
gaNapatiyE karuNAnidhiyE kaDaikkaN pArttaruLE shrI mahA


anupallavi

  tuNaiyaDi tozhum anbar tuyar tuDaikkum tuyyA
sundara caraNAravinda tudikkaiyA


caraNam    sakala surAsurar paNimalarp-padanE shankaran umaiyum manamagizh sutanE
jagam muzhudum nirai Anai mukhavanE tAL paNindEn tanjam nIyE bhagavanE
